jobDescription: Upscale restaurant in township of washington, nj (bergen county ) is seekinf FT and PT experienced dining room servers and bartenders.  Must have dining room and /or catering experience of at least a year, own transportation, prefer some knowledge of wines, flexible availability including days and/ or nights along with weekends.  Looking for a very punctual, professional, and friendly waitstaff to join our success and very busy restaurant. We have been in busy for almost 25 years!
